Task_Title: Check pump filter.
Warning_Text: Disconnect main c.b. and hold caution label
Steps_Text:
1- Disassemble oil filter.
2- Check that the filter is clean, if not, clean or rechange.

Task_Title: Check the fixation of the center steel
Steps_Text:
1- Check the fixation screws
2- If broken replace them
3- Tight them well and make sure the drum is freely rotating

Task_Title: Lubricate mandrel shaft and bead holder
Steps_Text:
Use the hand grease gun and lubricate the grease nipples located in the
shaft and bead holders with 5 strokes using Mobil B2 .

Task_Title: Change the oil of rotation and translation gearbox
Steps_Text:
1- Remove the drain plug and dump old oil in special barrel for
recycling then put the plug again.
2- Refill the grarbox with oil Mobil 632 till the level indicated on
the glass window is reached

Task_Title: Change the mandrel gearbox oil
Steps_Text:
1- Remove the gearbox rear cover
2- Dump the old oil using a hand pump
3- Refill the gearbox with oil using Mobil 629 till the level
indicator is covered with oil

Task_Title: Clean transfer bearing
Steps_Text:
1- remove the bearing fixation pallets
2- Replace the bearings incase of damaged
3- fix the pallets again and relubricate the bearing using Mobil B2

Task_Title: Lubrication of transfer unit
Steps_Text:
Remove the transfer base cover and lubricate all nipples with
hand grease gun using Mobil B2

Task_Title: Check conveyor belts number and condition
Steps_Text:
1- Visualy check the number and condition of liner and ply
conveyor belts
2- Replace any belt incase of damaged
3- Adjust the belt roller position to adjust belt tension

Task_Title: Check the liner blades condition and clearance
Warning_Text: Turn the knife controller onto manual position
Steps_Text:
1- Check the clearance using a filler anf adjust if required
2- Control the knife manually and cut a material
3- Grind the knife if required

Task_Title: Adjust liner and ply tray speed
Steps_Text:
1- Check manually the raise and lower speed of the tray
2- Adjust the flow regulator located at the tray lifting cylinders
to adjust the speed if required

Task_Title: Check the ply brushes and guides
Steps_Text:
1- Check the condition of the brush and replace if required
2- Check the guide distance and adjust through the adjusting
screws if required

Task_Title: Check the trays level from the drum
Steps_Text:
1- Lower the tray and check its level from the drum
2- Adjust the level if required from the stop block located on
the lifting cylinder rod

Task_Title: Lubricate the bearing housing and knife rod
Steps_Text:
1- Use the grease hand gun to lubricate the bearing housing until the
new grease appears around the bearing using Mobil B2
2- Lubricate the outer surface of liner knife for smooth sliding

Task_Title: Change liner and ply and knife gearbox oil
Steps_Text:
1- Remove the drain plug and dump old oil in special barrel for
recycling then put the plug again.
2- Refill the grarbox with oil Mobil 632 till the level indicated on
the glass window is reached

Task_Title: Check the bushes of the stitching bench
Steps_Text:
1- Move the stitching arms with hand to check the bushes
conditions
2- Replace the bushes in case if they are loose

Task_Title: Lubricate the stitching bench
Steps_Text:
1- Move the stitching bench forward to lubricate the grease
nipples located at the back
2- Move the stitching bench backward to lubricate the grease
nipples located at the front using Mobil B2

Task_Title: Check belts guides position
Steps_Text:
1- Check the guide distance and adjust through the adjusting
screws if required

Task_Title: Check the service belt tray rollers
Steps_Text:
1- Check the conditions of the rollers and replace with the same
size if required

Task_Title: Check the movement of the service belt carriage
Steps_Text:
1- Move the carriage right and left and check its speed and
stopping conditions
2- Adjust the speed from the flow regulator located on the
bottom cylinder

Task_Title: Lubricate the bobbin bearing housing
Steps_Text:
1- Use the grease hand gun to lubricate the bearing housing until the
new grease appears around the bearing using Mobil B2

Task_Title: Check the bobbin gearbox oil
Steps_Text:
1- Remove the drain plug and dump old oil in special barrel for
recycling then put the plug again.
2- Refill the grarbox with oil Mobil 632 till the level indicated on
the glass window is reached

Task_Title: Check the tread feeder rollers
Steps_Text:
Check the condition of the rollers and its bearings and replace
if required

Task_Title: Lubricate the auxiliary drum shaft
Steps_Text:
Use the hand grease gun and lubricate the grease nipples located
in the shaft using Mobil B2 .

Task_Title: Change the oil of the auxiliary drum gearbox
Steps_Text:
1- Remove the drain plug and dump old oil in special barrel for
recycling then put the plug again.
2- Refill the grarbox with oil Mobil 632 till the level indicated on
the glass window is reached

Task_Title: General check on air leakage
Steps_Text:
1- Check the sound of air leakage in air panels
2- Test the rotary for air leakage through any of its passages
3- Move the stitching bench arms and check for air leakage
during its movment

Task_Title: General machine cleaning
Steps_Text:
1- Clean the transfer movement guides
2- Clean the stitching bench sliding guides
3- Clean beneath the mandrel drum and stitching bench
4- Clean the sliding rollers for ply bobbin carriage
5- Clean any rubber accumulation on the ground in the machine

Task_Title: check of oil leakage of main gearbox
Steps_Text:
1- Visual inspection of all points in gearbox.
2- check oil level inside the gearbox .
3- check the oil seal of all joints.
4- check that there  is no any leakage in any connection point.

Task_Title: check of oil leakage of main gearbox
Steps_Text:
1- Visual inspection of all points in gearbox.
2- check oil level inside the gearbox .
3- check the oil seal of all joints.
4- check that there  is no any leakage in any connection point.
